description:
One thing that car camping overlanding is always missing… a roof. Attaching to your roof rack, the Crosswing lets you easily add and awning to your basecamp. With dual telescoping supports, the Crosswing isn’t bothered by heavy rain or blustery days. When you need a bit of shade or just want to get out of the elements, this awning gives you shelter in a matter of seconds, no more asking yourself if it is worth setting up your awning.

  • Rugged composite housing is UV resistant and cannot rust, other components are powder coated aluminum and stainless steel
  • Canopy is made from a 600D PVC coated polyester that is both UV and mold resistant
  • Canopy is replaceable should the unexpected happen
  • Rated for winds up to 40kph
  • Canopy extends with a simple pull, and the 1 handed Pronto Latch™ snugs down the fabric and locks it in place
  • Included Talon mounts secure to most roof racks and crossbars with T-slots
  • 3 positions: 0.9m, 1.5m, and 1.98m
  • Closed dimensions: 163 x 7.5 x 14.5cm
name: Kammok Crosswing
